entry.title: neuherbs Anti-Aging Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type:
Price: 999.00

neuherbs Anti-Aging Combo is here to provide a mesmerizing beauty from within. Skin Collagen Booster delivers collagen-boosting vitamins, optimum antioxidants & essential fats along with hyaluronic acid that may help reduce signs of aging like fine lines, wrinkles, scars due to poor wound healing, saggy skin etc. Vitamin E Plus is a 3-in-1 skin-nourishing formula that delivers the benefits of Vitamin E, MCT (Medium Chain Triglycerides) Oil, and Almond oil that helps promote skin rejuvenation and can help manage UV rays skin damage.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

  • Is it beneficial for people above 40 years of age?

    Yes, it contains natural plant based ingredients that may help manage early signs of aging usually starts occuring above the age of 30.

  • Does it help in improving skin quality damaged by air pollution?

    Yes, neuherbs Skin Collagen Booster contains natural antioxidants that help fight skin damage and improve its quality

  • What is the shelf-life of the Skin Collagen Booster?

    neuherbs Skin Collagen Booster is best before 18 months from the date of manufacture.

  • What is the shelf-life of the Vitamin E Plus?

    neuherbs Vitamin-E Plus is best before 18 months from the date of manufacture.

  • Does it also work for hair?

    Yes, the ingredients present in this capsules posseses antioxidants & anti-inflammatory property which help reduce inflammation & improve strength of hair follicles and provide essential oil to the hair, making them healthy.

  • What is the age limit for this product?

    As per the recommendation, neuherbs Vitamin E Plus capsules should be taken by people above the age of 18 years.

entry.title: neuherbs Vitamin E Plus
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Skin Vitamins
Price: 399.00 - 749.00 (2 variants)

To provide you with the benefits of natural Vitamin E, neuherbs has introduced Vitamin E Plus with Almond Oil. This 3-in-1 skin-nourishing formula delivers the benefits of Vitamin E, MCT (Medium Chain Triglycerides) oil, and Almond oil that helps promote skin rejuvenation and can help curb the skin damage.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits of Vitamin E Plus —

  • Vitamin E Plus For Managing Signs of Aging

    Vitamin E is a fat-soluble antioxidant that helps the skin fight free radical & stress related damage and also help protect from negative impacts of sun rays.

  • Vitamin E Plus For Reducing Inflammation

    MCT oil (a component of coconut oil) is composed of lauric acid, which is known to possess antimicrobial properties, and helps minimize inflammation in the skin.

  • Vitamin E Plus For Building Radiant Skin

    Almond oil is known to be rich in oleic acid (omega-9) which penetrates deep in the skin & locks in the moisture that helps manage dry & dull skin.

— Key Ingredients —

  • Vitamin E From Sunflower Oil

    To maintain skin elasticity

  • MCT Oil (Medium Chain Triglyecrides)

    To fight common skin issues

  • Almond Oil

    To keep skin moisturized & smooth

— How To Use —

  • Take one capsule

  • With 1 glass of water

  • Once in a day after your meal

  • What is the shelf-life of the product?

    neuherbs Vitamin-E Plus is best before 18 months from the date of manufacture.

  • What is the strength of this vitamin E capsule?

    Per serving of neuherbs Vitamin E Capsule is of 500 mg.

  • Does it also work for hair?

    Yes, the ingredients present in this capsules posseses antioxidants & anti-inflammatory property which help reduce inflammation & improve strength of hair follicles and provide essential oil to the hair, making them healthy.

  • What is the age limit for this product?

    As per the recommendation, neuherbs Vitamin E Plus capsules should be taken by people above the age of 18 years.

  • Does the capsule made up of geltain?

    No, neuherbs Vitamin E Plus capsules contains veg capsule shell and it is a 100% vegan product.

  • How many capsules are there is one bottle?

    There are total 30 N capsules available in one bottle of neuherbs Vitamin E Plus.

  • Can we apply the oil on skin by opening the capsule?

    Yes, you can apply the oil on face by opeing the capsule shell as the capsule contains only natural ingredients. But we recommend you to please do a patch test before proceeding for the same.

entry.title: Plant-Based Skin Collagen Booster Supplement (Vitamin C, E, Antioxidant blend, Hyaluronic Acid & Biotin). Gluten-free formula for Anti-Ageing Beauty & Glowing Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Skin Vitamins
Price: 789.00 - 1499.00 (2 variants)

Natural collagen nutrition to provide ever-lasting youthfulness to the skin. neuherbs is here with plant-based Skin Collagen Booster that delivers collagen-boosting vitamins, optimum antioxidants & essential fats along with hyaluronic acid.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Collagen boost For Skin Elasticity

    Collagen production declines as people age, contributing to skin wrinkles and drooping. Skin Collagen Booster provides natural vitamin C that helps promote natural collagen production that gives skin strength and elasticity.

  • Antioxidants For Early Signs of Aging

    Antioxidants benefit from green tea, acai berry, goji berry, spirulina & ellagic acid, that helps fight free-radical damage, which can cause early signs of aging.

  • Super Seeds For Essential Oils

    Goodness of Pumpkin, sesame & quinoa seeds that are known to provide essential fats& minerals to keep skin nourished & radiant.

— Key Ingredients —

  • Hyaluronic Acid

    To provide lubrication & moisture to skin

  • Goji Berry

    To help skin fight free-radicals damage

  • Piperine & Curcumin

    To deliver better results

— How To Use —

  • 7 g (1 scoop) of neuherbs Skin Collagen Booster

     

  • One glass (200 ml) of lukewarm water or normal water

     

  • 30 minutes after your meal

     

  • Does it help in improving skin quality damaged by air pollution?

    It contains natural antioxidants that help fight skin damage and improve its quality

  • Is it beneficial for people above 40 years of age?

    Yes, it contains natural plant based ingredients that may help manage early signs of aging usually starts occuring above the age of 30.

  • Can we add it to a smoothie?

    Yes, you can add it in smoothies as per your taste preference.

  • What is its shelf-life?

    neuherbs Skin Collagen Booster is best before 18 months from the date of manufacture.

  • Can I add lemon to it?

    Yes, to enhance its taste you can add lemon in it.

  • Does it contain preservatives?

    No, neuherbs Collagen booster is a plant-based formula that doesn't contain added preservatives.

  • Is it flavoured?

    No, neuherbs Skin Collagen booster contains the natural taste and flavour of ingredients from which it has been made.
